name: deepsubx
description: DeepSubX is a subtitle translator that uses AI models to translate subtitles quickly and accurately into multiple languages. It supports various subtitle formats and a self-hostable web interface.
features: AI Translation: Accurate subtitle translation using AI models. Professional quality output.
Multi-Language Support: Translate to dozens of languages. Global accessibility.
Format Compatibility: Works with all major subtitle formats. Universal subtitle handling.
Fast Processing: Quick translations for entire subtitle files. Save time on localization.
Web Interface: Simple browser-based translation tool. No software installation needed.
Self-Hosted: Process subtitles privately on your server. Complete data privacy.
